column1: # ===== WATER TAP ASSET MANAGEMENT - BULK UPLOAD TEMPLATE =====
# IMPORTANT: Do not modify or delete these instruction rows (lines starting with #)
# These instructional rows will be automatically ignored during upload processing
# ‚ö†Ô∏è  CRITICAL FORMAT REQUIREMENTS:
# üìÖ DATES: DD/MM/YYYY format ONLY (e.g.
#    ‚ùå REJECTED: YYYY-MM-DD
#    ‚úÖ ACCEPTED: 30/04/2025
# üîò YES/NO FIELDS: Only YES or NO (case-insensitive)
#    ‚úÖ ACCEPTED: YES
#    ‚ùå REJECTED: Y
# üìã REQUIRED FIELDS: Asset Barcode
# üìã OPTIONAL FIELDS: All other fields can be left empty
# üìù DETAILED FIELD DESCRIPTIONS:
# - Asset Barcode: Unique identifier for the asset (REQUIRED)
# - Location: Room or area where asset is located (REQUIRED)
# - Asset Type: Type of asset (Water Tap
# - Augmented Care: YES or NO - whether asset requires special care or attention
# - Filter Needed: YES or NO - whether asset needs filter replacement
# - Filter Installed: Date when filter was installed (DD/MM/YYYY format only)
# - Filters On: YES or NO - whether filters are currently active
# - Need Flushing: YES or NO - whether asset needs regular flushing
# - Filter Type: Type of filter (Standard
# üö® BULK UPLOAD BEHAVIOR:
# - Filter logic is NOT applied during bulk upload
# - All filter fields are stored exactly as provided
# - Filter Expiry Date is NOT auto-calculated during bulk upload
# - Auto-calculation only occurs in manual Add/Edit forms
Asset Barcode
